data.title: New York Yankees Color Codes Hex, RGB, and CMYK
data.meta_description: The New York Yankees colors are Navy Blue, Red and Gray. This page includes their Hex, RGB, CMYK and PANTONE color codes.
data.text:
The New York Yankees colors are blue, red, navy blue, and gray. The New York Yankees team colors in Hex, RGB, and CMYK can be found below. The New York Yankees are a team from New York City, New York. The biggest rivals of the New York Yankees are the Boston Red Sox.

New York Yankees Primary Colors (1968 – present)

The primary colors of the New York Yankees can be found in the table below.

New York Yankees Pantone Color Codes

The New York Yankees MLB team Pantone colors are PMS 287 C for blue, PMS 185 C for red, PMS 289 C for navy blue, and PMS Cool Gray 7 C for gray.

The blue Pantone color of the New York Yankees can be found below.

PMS 287 C

The red Pantone color of the New York Yankees can be found below.

PMS 185 C

The navy blue Pantone color of the New York Yankees can be found below.

PMS 289 C

The gray Pantone color of the New York Yankees can be found below.

PMS Cool Gray 7 C

New York Yankees Color Codes HEX

The New York Yankees colors HEX codes are #003087 for blue, #E4002C for red, #0C2340 for navy blue, and #C4CED3 for gray.

The blue HEX color code for the New York Yankees baseball team can be found below.

#003087

The red HEX colour code for the New York Yankees can be found below.

#E4002C

The navy blue HEX colour code for the New York Yankees can be found below.

#0C2340

The gray HEX colour code for the New York Yankees can be found below.

#C4CED3

New York Yankees Color Codes RGB

The New York Yankees colors RGB codes are (0, 48, 135) for blue, (228, 0, 44) for red, (12, 35, 64) for navy blue, and (196, 206, 211) for gray colour.

The blue RGB color code for the New York Yankees can be found below.

(0, 48, 135)

The red RGB colour code for the New York Yankees can be found below.

(228, 0, 44)

The navy blue RGB colour code for the New York Yankees can be found below.

(12, 35, 64)

The gray RGB colour code for the New York Yankees can be found below.

(196, 206, 211)

New York Yankees Color Codes CMYK

The New York Yankees colors CMYK codes are (100, 69, 00, 11.5) for blue, (0, 91, 76, 0) for red, (100, 60, 00, 56) for navy blue, and (0, 10, 7, 11) for gray color.

The blue CMYK color code for the New York Yankees can be found below.

(100, 69, 0, 11.5)

The red CMYK colour code for the New York Yankees can be found below.

(0, 91, 76, 0)

The navy blue CMYK colour code for the New York Yankees can be found below.

(100, 60, 0, 56)

The gray CMYK colour code for the New York Yankees can be found below.

(0, 10, 7, 11)

New York Yankees Logo Colors

The New York Yankees logo colors are blue, red, navy blue, and gray. The blue color code for the New York Yankees logo is Pantone: PMS 287 C, Hex Color: #003087, RGB: (0, 48, 135), CMYK: (100, 69, 00, 11.5). The red color code for the New York Yankees logo is Pantone: PMS 185 C, Hex Color: #E4002C, RGB: (228, 0, 44), CMYK: (0, 91, 76, 0). The navy blue color code for the New York Yankees logo is Pantone: PMS 289 C, Hex Color: #0C2340, RGB: (12, 35, 64), CMYK: (100, 60, 00, 56). The gray color code for the New York Yankees logo is Pantone: PMS Cool Gray 7 C, Hex Color: #C4CED3, RGB: (196, 206, 211), CMYK: (0, 10, 7, 11).

New York Yankees Logo

The New York Yankees logo has blue and red colors and features a baseball bat that is a part of the letter “K” in the word “Yankees”. On top of the bat is a top hat worn by Uncle Sam. A baseball with red stitches can also be seen on the logo. The New York Yankees logo meaning symbolizes the moniker of the team and how the team pays homage to its country.

New York Yankees Logo Color Palette Image Format

The New York Yankees logo colours can be found in an image format below.

New York Yankees Logo Fonts

The New York Yankees logo font is a custom New York Yankees typeface. The custom New York Yankees font is used for jersey lettering, player names, numbers, team logo, branding, and merchandise.

New York Yankees Logo JPG

The New York Yankees logo JPG format can be found below.

To download the New York Yankees logo JPG format, right-click and choose save.

New York Yankees Logo PNG

The New York Yankees logo PNG format can be found below.

To download the New York Yankees logo PNG format, right-click and choose save.

New York Yankees Jersey 2022

The New York Yankees jersey colors are Uniform navy and white. The New York Yankees uniform has been the same since 1949. The New York Yankees jersey in an image format can be found below.

To download the New York Yankees 2022 jersey image, right click and choose save.
